title: And Tango Makes Three: A Penguin Love Story
description: A micro-lesson that makes And Tango Makes Three: A Penguin Love Story usable.

hook.text: Two male penguins in Central Park Zoo raised a chick. A picture book about it became the most banned in America.

buildup.text: And Tango Makes Three is based on the true story of Roy and Silo, who formed a pair bond at the zoo.

discovery.text: Zookeepers gave them a fertilized egg. They took turns warming it and raised the chick, Tango, successfully.

climax.text: Libraries fought to keep it. The story is factual, gentle, and about love â€” the controversy only drew more attention.

punchline.text: Two penguins raised a chick. Adults couldn't handle it.
